additionalInfo.title: Web Projects : Role & Responsibility
description: Creating web pages based on UX design, customizing styles etc
Creating generic or custom components to enhance the web application which are not supported by design workshop
Involved in Technical discussion to enhance the product, Peer Review and code management using GIT
Mentor new team member provide technical & functional support
Tracking task in JIRA, providing day to day update to project management team
